languages.text: {n}Маражай растягивает рот в довольном оскале.{/n} "О нет. Ни в коей мере. В любой момент, когда ты почувствуешь, что душа твоя начинает жаждать боли..."
{n}Marazhai's mouth stretches wide in a satisfied grin.{/n} "Oh no. By no means. Anytime you feel your soul beginning to hunger for pain..."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай растягивает рот в довольном оскале.{/n} "О нет. Ни в коей мере. В любой момент, когда ты почувствуешь, что душа твоя начинает жаждать боли..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches wide in a satisfied grin.{/n} "Oh no. By no means. Anytime you feel your soul beginning to hunger for pain..."
{n}Marazhai's mouth stretches wide in a satisfied grin.{/n} "Oh no. By no means. Anytime you feel your soul beginning to hunger for pain..."
{n}Marazhai's mouth stretches wide in a satisfied grin.{/n} "Oh no. By no means. Anytime you feel your soul beginning to hunger for pain..."
{n}Marazhai's mouth stretches wide in a satisfied grin.{/n} "Oh no. By no means. Anytime you feel your soul beginning to hunger for pain..."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋咧开嘴角，满意地笑了起来。{/n}“噢，是啊，绝对不会。只要你的灵魂开始渴望痛苦的滋养……”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches wide in a satisfied grin.{/n} "Oh no. By no means. Anytime you feel your soul beginning to hunger for pain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋咧开嘴角，满意地笑了起来。{/n}“噢，是啊，绝对不会。只要你的灵魂开始渴望痛苦的滋养……”

languages.text: {n}La boca de Marazhai se ensancha en una sonrisa de satisfacción.{/n} «Oh, no. En absoluto. Siempre que sientas en tu alma la sed de dolor...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches wide in a satisfied grin.{/n} "Oh no. By no means. Anytime you feel your soul beginning to hunger for pain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La boca de Marazhai se ensancha en una sonrisa de satisfacción.{/n} «Oh, no. En absoluto. Siempre que sientas en tu alma la sed de dolor...».

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent dans un sourire satisfait.{/n} « Oh non. Ce n'est que le début. Dès que vous sentirez que votre âme se languit de la souffrance d'autrui... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches wide in a satisfied grin.{/n} "Oh no. By no means. Anytime you feel your soul beginning to hunger for pain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent dans un sourire satisfait.{/n} « Oh non. Ce n'est que le début. Dès que vous sentirez que votre âme se languit de la souffrance d'autrui... »

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Mund weitet sich zu einem zufriedenen Grinsen.{/n} "Oh nein. Auf keinen Fall. Immer wenn Eure Seele nach Schmerz hungert ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches wide in a satisfied grin.{/n} "Oh no. By no means. Anytime you feel your soul beginning to hunger for pain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Mund weitet sich zu einem zufriedenen Grinsen.{/n} "Oh nein. Auf keinen Fall. Immer wenn Eure Seele nach Schmerz hungert ..."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは満足そうに口を大きく開けた。{/n}「そんな。とんでもない。魂が痛みに飢え始めたと感じたら、いつでも…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches wide in a satisfied grin.{/n} "Oh no. By no means. Anytime you feel your soul beginning to hunger for pain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは満足そうに口を大きく開けた。{/n}「そんな。とんでもない。魂が痛みに飢え始めたと感じたら、いつでも…」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın dudakları yayılarak tatmin olmuş bir sırıtmaya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Ah, hayır. Katiyen. Ruhunun ne zaman ki acıya susamaya başladığını hissedersin..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches wide in a satisfied grin.{/n} "Oh no. By no means. Anytime you feel your soul beginning to hunger for pain..."
